games.summary: Scottie Barnes and RJ Barrett each scored 23 points, Immanuel Quickley and Sandro Mamukelashvili both had 15 and the Toronto Raptors won their third straight game by thumping the Milwaukee Bucks 128-100 on Tuesday night. Gradey Dick scored 14 points and Brandon Ingram had 13.

Zaccharie Risacher scored 21 points, Nickeil Alexander-Walker had 20 and the Atlanta Hawks beat the Orlando Magic 127-112 on Tuesday night. Daniels was 8 for 9 from the field as the Hawks shot 55.6% and led by 25 points while improving to 2-0 against the Magic this season.
blurbs: 📋 Nickeil Alexander-Walker (ATL) made just his 5th start this season. 20 pts, 1 reb.

games.summary: Josh Giddey had a triple-double with 29 points, 15 rebounds and 12 assists, Nikola Vucevic made a 3-pointer with 3.2 seconds remaining and the Chicago Bulls came back from a 24-point deficit to beat the Philadelphia 76ers 113-111 on Tuesday night. The Sixers scored 45 points in the first to take an 18-point lead and stayed in front for the majority of the game.
blurbs: 📋 Jabari Walker (PHI) made just his 4th start this season. 2 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: Jose Alvarado made a go-ahead 3-pointer with 16 seconds left and the New Orleans Pelicans won for the first time this season by beating the Charlotte Hornets 116-112 on Tuesday night. Miles Bridges scored 22 points and rookie Kon Knueppel had 20 points and 12 rebounds for the Hornets, who played without LaMelo Ball for a second straight game because of a right ankle injury.
blurbs: 📋 Jordan Poole (NO) made just his 4th start this season. 11 pts, 2 reb.
📋 Jeremiah Fears (NO) made just his 5th start this season. 11 pts, 3 reb.
📋 Sion James (CHA) made just his 3rd start this season. 6 pts, 5 reb.

games.summary: Stephen Curry scored 28 points with five 3-pointers, Moses Moody came off the bench to score 24 and also hit five 3s, and the Golden State Warriors jumped to a big early lead before holding on for a 118-107 victory over the short-handed Phoenix Suns on Tuesday night. Devin Booker scored a season-high 38 points, converting all 11 of his free throws.
blurbs: 📋 Quinten Post (GS) made just his 4th start this season. 14 pts, 7 reb.
📋 Royce O'Neale (PHX) made just his 5th start this season. 8 pts, 6 reb.
📋 Mark Williams (PHX) made just his 4th start this season. 16 pts, 16 reb.

games.summary: Isaiah Joe added 22 points and Cason Wallace and Aaron Wiggins each had 12 to help the Thunder overcame an early surge by the Clippers to set a franchise record for consecutive victories to start a season. scored 16 points as the Clippers lost consecutive home games after winning the first three in their own building.
blurbs: 🆕 Nicolas Batum (LAC) made his first start of the season. 18 min, 3 pts.
🆕 Kris Dunn (LAC) made his first start of the season. 30 min, 6 pts.
